# FOOD {#Food}

I adore food. It is my FAVOURITE THING IN THIS WORLD. I need to just make this clear that this is the more important part of my whole book. I am a vegan which people find annoying but honestly it's not that bad. 
I like: 

- Baking pies 
- Eating out at restaurants 
- Eating at home 
- Eating at school 
- Eating at work
- Eating cookies 
- Eating chips 
- I think you get the idea that I love food and it fills that void in my cold empty heart
